author: rappoccio
body:
#### PR description:

This adds a trivial protection against the issue reported [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/30112). 

#### PR validation:

There is a test script in the issue report [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/30112)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This not a backport, but the original. 


Also tagging @laurenhay @ahinzmann @alefisico
title: Adding protection against garbage pointers
